one_reviews_text:
Wow, what a VRSoft! Amazing, but please, add a "gate" and a option to to make loops and duration of samples!!!!!

Congrats!!
review_feedback:
Hey KomoKaru!
Thanks for the review. There is a gate in the dynamics plugin. A better sample editor is on the list. Not sure what you mean by make loops, you can record in the avatar/audio recorder and choose one shot or not to loop. Join our discord to discuss any requests at https://discord.gg/mg6ZJHx

one_reviews_text:
I have had this app for a few months and I use it daily. It never gets old, and I am always learning something new about it. 
It is the most sophisticated DAW in VR that I have ever came across. I definately recommend Tranzient for those that want to make music and create cool visuals. 
I look forward to seeing this app progress and what the future holds for Tranzient. This is definately the macdaddy DAW of virtual reality.

review_title: Underdog industry LEADERSHIP! Unto the G
one_reviews_text: GREATEST Creative Powers on Musical production, performAnce and VR/AR document recording.

review_title: Thank you! It is loading Now!
one_reviews_text: Seems like a nice music application with a lot to offer!
